item.title: PCA and MDS
item.description: A mock data set consisting of 100 data points, say \(\mathbf{P}_1, \cdots, \mathbf{P}_{100}\) in \(\mathbb{R}^3\): ## Create a perturbed and slanted elipse in R^3 set.seed(2018) x_center <- 3 y_center <- 1 z_center <- 2 x_stretch <- 4 y_stretch <- 3 z_stretch <- 1 angle <- pi/3 x_ori <- x_stretch*cos(2*pi*(1:n)/n) + rnorm(n, mean = 0, sd = 0.5) y_ori <- y_stretch*sin(2*pi*(1:n)/n) + rnorm(n, mean = 0, sd = 0.
